description: s3.transfer methods accept path-like objects as input
[``botocore``] This release updates the ListConnectorEntities API action so that it returns paginated responses that customers can retrieve with next tokens.

[``botocore``] AWS DataSync now supports the use of tags with task executions. With this new feature, you can apply tags each time you execute a task, giving you greater control and management over your task executions.
[``botocore``] Update efs client to latest version
[``botocore``] This release provides the valid characters for the Description and Name field.
[``botocore``] Updated error handling for empty resource names in "UpdateSignalCatalog" and "GetModelManifest" operations.

[``botocore``] AWS sagemaker - Features: This release adds support for random seed, it's an integer value used to initialize a pseudo-random number generator. Setting a random seed will allow the hyperparameter tuning search strategies to produce more consistent configurations for the same tuning job.
